title: The Rain Vortex
content: You are standing before the world's largest indoor waterfall. At 40 meters high, the Rain Vortex recirculates 37,850 liters of water per minute. The water is harvested from rain and creates a cooling effect for the entire garden.

title: Shiseido Forest Valley
content: This terraced garden houses over 900 trees and palms, and about 60,000 shrubs. The design was inspired by the rice terraces of Southeast Asia, allowing you to hike up a gentle incline surrounded by lush greenery.

title: Canopy Park
content: Located at the topmost level (L5), this 14,000 sqm recreational wonderland features discovery slides, foggy bowls, and petal gardens. It is designed to be a playground for all ages, sitting just beneath the glass dome.

title: The Crystal Bridge
content: Suspended 23 meters above ground, the Canopy Bridge offers the best vantage point of the Rain Vortex. Its glass bottom floor allows you to see right through to the forest floor belowâ€”if you are brave enough!
